001package com.fns.grivet.repo;
002
003import org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository;
004import org.springframework.data.repository.query.Param;
005import org.springframework.data.rest.core.annotation.RepositoryRestResource;
006
007import com.fns.grivet.query.NamedQuery;
008
009@RepositoryRestResource(collectionResourceRel = "namedQueries", path = "namedQueries")
010public interface NamedQueryRepository extends JpaRepository<NamedQuery, Integer> {
011
012    public NamedQuery findByName(@Param("name") String name);
013}
